name: StocktheBar
0:
”Alexa, open Stock the Bar”
”Alexa, Stock the Bar”
”Alexa, launch Stock the Bar”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stock the bar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Whether you’re planning a dinner party or wine-tasting, knowing how much wine, beer and liquor to have on hand is an important part of hosting and bartending. Reduce the stress of hosting and determine how many bottles of wine, beer and liquor you need for a successful night of entertaining. Stock the Bar will determine the ideal amount of booze to have at your next gathering to ensure a fun night of socializing. To get started, just dictate the number of guests you’re expecting, as well as the duration of your event. Stock the Bar will then ask your preferences for alcohol and provide answers to your bartending questions.

With Stock the Bar’s help, you’ll have more time to enjoy a night with friends and acquaintances, and a well-stocked bar to boot! By activating the skill, you’ll discover the perfect amount of wine, beer and liquor to chill before your event. Dazzle your guests with your bartending skills and hospitality and leave the logistics to Stock the Bar.

For 21+

Created for you by Constellation Brands, Inc.

Please drink responsibly.
